= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Neck sensory data* (neck-sensory-data)
   * *Neck - cutaneous receptors of low neck* (neck-low-cutaneous-receptors -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_DRG AVA.PN.SG.DRG]): skin of medial infraclavicular region
  * *Neck flexors* (neck-flexors)
   * *Neck - scalenus anterior muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_SC_VH_SAN HMA.SC.VH.SAN] -> neck-scalenus-anterior): elevates first rib, rotate the neck to the opposite side
   * *Neck - scalenus medius muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_SC_VH_SAN HMA.SC.VH.SAN] -> neck-scalenus-medius): elevate 1st rib, laterally flex (bend) the neck to the same side
   * *Neck - scalenus posterior muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_SC_VH_SAN HMA.SC.VH.SAN] -> neck-scalenus-posterior): elevate 2nd rib, tilt the neck to the same side
   * *Neck - longus capitis muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_SC_VH_SAN HMA.SC.VH.SAN] -> neck-longus-capitis): flexion of neck at atlanto-occipital joint
   * *Neck - longus colli muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_SC_VH_SAN HMA.SC.VH.SAN] -> neck-longus-colli): flexes the neck and head
   * *Neck - rectus capitis anterior muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_SC_VH_SAN HMA.SC.VH.SAN] -> neck-rectus-capitis-anterior): flexion of neck at atlanto-occipital joint
   * *Neck - rectus capitis lateralis muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_SC_VH_SAN HMA.SC.VH.SAN] -> neck-rectus-capitis-lateralis): sidebend at atlanto-occipital joint, takes care of flexing the neck
   * *Neck - sternocleidomastoid muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> neck-sternocleidomastoid): acting alone, tilts head to its own side and rotates it so the face is turned towards the opposite side; acting together, flexes the neck, raises the sternum and assists in forced inspiration
  * *Neck extensors* (neck-extensors)
   * *Neck - obliquus capitis inferior muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> neck-obliquus-capitis-inferior-muscle): rotation of head and neck
   * *Neck - obliquus capitis superior muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> neck-obliquus-capitis-superior-muscle): extends head and flex head to the ipsilateral side
   * *Neck - rectus capitis posterior major muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> neck-rectus-capitis-posterior-major-muscle): ipsilateral rotation of head and extension
   * *Neck - rectus capitis posterior minor muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> neck-rectus-capitis-posterior-minor-muscle): extends the head at the neck, but is considered to be more of a sensory organ than a muscle
   * *Neck - semispinalis capitis* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> neck-semispinalis-capitis): extend the head
   * *Neck - splenius capitis muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> neck-splenius-capitis): prime mover for head extension; can also allow lateral flexion and rotation of the cervical spine
   * *Neck - splenius cervicis muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> neck-splenius-cervicis): bilaterally: extend the head and neck, unilaterally: lateral flexion to the same side, rotation to the same side
